DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the READ study is to compare the continuation of the cardiac rehabilitation at home with clinical follow-up, therapeutic education, and advice on the training at the stamina, via telemedicine with the classic strategy in day hospital.
DOC.brief_title: Cardiac Rehabilitation of Heart Failure Patients by Telemedicine
DOC.criteria: Patient with a dysfunction of left ventricle with ejection fraction of left ventricle < 40 % appreciated by echocardiogram at hospital discharge for cardiac rehabilitation. Patient non authorized to follow an effort training Therapeutic education impossible Pregnant woman or breastfeeding No assent Incapacity to use the terminal Minor patient or under supervision
